name: Bicycle storage
description: Providing a secure place for guests to store their bicycles during their stay.

name: Basic repair tools
description: Offering tools like tire pumps, wrenches, and patch kits for guests to perform minor bicycle repairs.

name: Laundry facilities
description: Allowing guests to do their laundry during their stay, including access to washing machines and dryers.

name: Kitchen access
description: Permitting guests to use the kitchen to prepare their meals, including access to cooking utensils, pots, and pans.

name: Bicycle maintenance
description: Designating a space where guests can perform more extensive bicycle maintenance and repairs.

name: Local cycling maps/routes
description: Offering maps and information about nearby cycling routes and points of interest.

name: Shower facilities
description: Providing access to showers for guests to freshen up after a day of cycling.

name: Wi-Fi access
description: Offering internet connectivity for guests to stay connected during their stay.

name: Safety equipment
description: Providing access to safety equipment like helmets, reflective gear, and bike lights for guests who may need them.

name: Local guides/tours
description: Offering guided tours or connecting guests with local guides who can lead them on adventures in the area.

name: Pets allowed
description: Allowing guests to bring their pets along for the ride, provided they adhere to certain rules and guidelines.

name: Accessibility features
description: Ensuring that accommodations are accessible to guests with disabilities or special needs.
